tool.name: Nearest Neighbor Calculation [SPAC][DMAP]
tool.description: Computes the shortest distance from each cell to the nearest cell of each phenotype. The distance table is stored with the key name "Label". \ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation
tool.command: echo '{"analysis": {"type": "file", "name": "output.pickle"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --bool-values Verbose --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.nearest_neighbor_calculation_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream_Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: ImageID
param.label: ImageID
param.help: If multiple images are in the dataset, specify the annotation with image IDs. Otherwise, use "None" to treat the dataset as a single image.

param.name: Verbose
param.label: Verbose
param.help: Indicates whether to print progress messages.

param.name: Nearest_Neighbor_Associated_Table
param.label: Nearest Neighbor Associated Table
param.help: Key name to store the calculated distances. Default is "spatial_distance".

tool.help: **Nearest Neighbor Calculation [SPAC][DMAP]** Computes the shortest distance from each cell to the nearest cell of each phenotype. The distance table is stored with the key name "Label". \ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - analysis: file (output.pickle)
